ygData.subject: Re: Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
ygData.msgSnippet: There are a few Named orcs that spawn near HH...They all have the same last name...one of them is Chief so and so...and he s level 20 I think...I have seen
ygData.messageBody:
There are a few Named orcs that spawn near HH...They all have the same last
name...one of them is Chief so and so...and he's level 20 I think...I have
seen five or six different orcs near there...

There are no official orc camps in the zone, tho....BTW if you're going to
hunt Kithicor, I advise you to get a compass, or max out your sense heading
skill...it gets very confusing for some reason...I still get lost
sometimes...


-----Original Message-----
From: G2 Dan <drockwell@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, July 12, 1999 5:34 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*


>From: "G2 Dan" <drockwell@...>
>
>What is up with Kithicor? I ran into a mean RED orc there the other nite
>that chased me out of there and into Rivervale in a hurry. All I remember
>was the painful hits and a "lord something" attached to his name. Any
>clues? Is there an orc camp in the zone?
>
>Gediprime
>17th Lvl & Lovin it!
>Xegony
>
